definition: a wingless sterile ant or termite having a large head and powerful jaws adapted for defending the colony, serve as a soldier in the military
details:
noun
- a wingless sterile ant or termite having a large head and powerful jaws adapted for defending the colony
- an enlisted man or woman who serves in an army
= example: an enlisted man or woman who serves in an army
verb
- serve as a soldier in the military
